snippet: The Carlyle Group said Friday that it had bought Cogentrix Energy's North American power plants from Goldman Sachs, as the private equity firm seeks to build up a presence in the energy business.
abstract: The Carlyle Group said Friday that it had bought Cogentrix Energy's North American power plants from Goldman Sachs, as the private equity firm seeks to build up a presence in the energy business.

headline.main: Carlyle Buys Power Plants From Goldman Sachs
